Computer_Science_400_p$Computer_Science_.text:
Finding A: In contrast, when participants completed word-search puzzles with their iPhone in their possession, heart rate and blood pressure levels returned to baseline and cognitive performance increased.
Finding B: In informal meetings, professionals in the Southwest were least accepting of mobile phone use.
Finding C: We show that, at the aggregate level, the airlines that began charging for one checked bag saw a significant relative improvement in their on-time departure performance in the 35-day period afterwards, compared to the airlines that were not charging for a checked bag during the same time period.
Finding D: Hyperspectral and RGB imaging not only address this issue, Ge said, but should also further speed the process of simultaneously comparing multiple traits among plant varieties.

Finding B: In informal meetings, professionals in the Southwest were least accepting of mobile phone use.
Finding C: We show that, at the aggregate level, the airlines that began charging for one checked bag saw a significant relative improvement in their on-time departure performance in the 35-day period afterwards, compared to the airlines that were not charging for a checked bag during the same time period.
Finding D: Hyperspectral and RGB imaging not only address this issue, Ge said, but should also further speed the process of simultaneously comparing multiple traits among plant varieties.

test_question_testing_D.text:

Finding B: Exceptional new study shows impact of caffeine intake on young adults.

Computer_Science_61_p$Computer_Science_4.text:
Finding A: Compared with controls, taxi drivers had greater grey matter volume in the posterior hippocampi (Maguire et al.
Finding B: We prove that constant-depth quantum circuits are more powerful than their classical counterparts.
Finding C: Showing these figures and tables can also foster productive conversations about how generation, gender, and status affect perceptions of appropriate mobile phone use in formal and informal settings.
Finding D: If their active participation in the organization of the data in virtual memory palaces makes a meaningful difference, then that could be further useful in designing interaction-based virtual environments that could one day assist in far superior information management and recall tools than those currently available to us.

Computer_Science_490_r$Computer_Science_.text:
Finding A: "We were able to implement digital control over intensity and frequency of the light being emitted, and the devices are very miniaturized, so they can be implanted under the scalp.
Finding B: The program states can include all desired experimental protocols for the implant.
Finding C: This indicates that there are synergies between places and people; certain characteristics will make a refugee a better match for a particular location.
Finding D: Mixed reality variations improve learning, over screen-only options. CMU researchers.

Computer_Science_407_p$Computer_Science_.text:
Finding A: Allowing users to retract recently posted comments may help minimize regret .
Finding B: A very interesting study appeared recently in Arxiv on spatial notions for robotic systems. According to the researchers, the robots should develop its own perceptual notions, analyzing its sensorimotor experiences and identifying meaningful patterns. #AI
Finding C: "Mixed-reality games that support physical observation in the real world have a great potential to enhance learning and enjoyment for young children," the researchers say.
Finding D: Young people, 94% of whom own a mobile phone, find the whole spectrum of phone behavior more acceptable than older people, by a significant margin: USC Those differences are still there, if less pronounced, for more formal meetings: USC Certain parts of phone etiquette remain constant, but for younger people in particular, it's worth taking into account the people you're working with before making a grab for an iPhone.

Finding D: Young people, 94% of whom own a mobile phone, find the whole spectrum of phone behavior more acceptable than older people, by a significant margin: USC Those differences are still there, if less pronounced, for more formal meetings: USC Certain parts of phone etiquette remain constant, but for younger people in particular, it's worth taking into account the people you're working with before making a grab for an iPhone.

Computer_Science_tweet_17_r$Computer_Sci.text:
Finding A: An optical version of a brain-inspired neurosynaptic system, using wavelength division multiplexing techniques, is presented that is capable of supervised and unsupervised learning. #deeplearning
Finding B: Each label type reduced lunch calories by approximately 10%.
Finding C: "These results showed that participants were successfully using neurofeedback to alter their pattern of brain activity according to a predefined objective in specific regions of their brain\'s motor cortex, without moving any body part.
Finding D: These results show that mixed-reality led to more learning than screen only, for both the mousecontrol and physical-control conditions ( Figure 10 ).

Computer_Science_tweet_131_r$Computer_Sc.text:
Finding A: Is it worse to receive negative attention than none at all? Ostracised workers fare worse than harassed workers
Finding B: We believe this is a first step in using virtual environments for creating more memorable experiences that enhance productivity through better recall of large amounts of information organized using the idea of virtual memory palaces.
Finding C: With the new research, scientists can definitively say that London taxi drivers not only have larger-than-average memory centers in their brains, but also that their intensive training is responsible for the growth.
Finding D: Each label type reduced lunch calories by approximately 10%.

Computer_Science_tweet_1_p$Computer_Scie.text:
Finding A: The 3D printed prostate model demonstrated high fidelity with patient organ and tissue in ana tomical, static and dynamic mechanical, hardness, and optical properties.
Finding B: In Study 1 (n = 182), 76% of participants thought that it would be more moral for AVs to sacrifice one passenger, rather than kill ten pedestrians (with a 95% confidence interval of 69-82).
Finding C: Our approach led to gains of roughly 40 to 70%, on average, in refugees\' employment outcomes relative to current assignment practices.
Finding D: The motivational impact of social incentives, coupled with sufficient tax breaks or additional advantages coming from customers, regulators, or investors, would make them as effective for employers as offering financial incentives."

Finding A: The 3D printed prostate model demonstrated high fidelity with patient organ and tissue in ana tomical, static and dynamic mechanical, hardness, and optical properties.
Finding B: In Study 1 (n = 182), 76% of participants thought that it would be more moral for AVs to sacrifice one passenger, rather than kill ten pedestrians (with a 95% confidence interval of 69-82).
Finding C: Our approach led to gains of roughly 40 to 70%, on average, in refugees\' employment outcomes relative to current assignment practices.
Finding D: The motivational impact of social incentives, coupled with sufficient tax breaks or additional advantages coming from customers, regulators, or investors, would make them as effective for employers as offering financial incentives."

Computer_Science_385_p$Computer_Science_.text:
Finding A: The study found that higher levels of immersion (in this case, field of view) were more effective in learning complex procedures that reference spatial locations.
Finding B: We show that, at the aggregate level, the airlines that began charging for one checked bag saw a significant relative improvement in their on-time departure performance in the 35-day period afterwards, compared to the airlines that were not charging for a checked bag during the same time period.
Finding C: These high-resolution 3D images provided detailed information about a tumor\'s volume and the structure of its blood vessel networks.
Finding D: #Echolocation versus echo suppression in #humans. #scicomm
